item.title: Drifting Card Algorithm
item.description: .entry-content::after { /* keep floating content in flow, have div respond */ content: ""; clear: both; display: table; } #demo { display: inline; float: right; } Aim: To have cards drift to a predefined grid point while under the criteria of: Have no crossing paths

item.title: Teem, "Tiamat's" Signmaker
item.description: Teem2’7” ; 31lbs ; NG Str→11Dex→18Con→16Int→10Wis→14Cha→16 PersuasionDeceptionInvestigationSurvival CommonDraconicGoblin Painters Supplies PrestidigitationFrostbiteFaerie FireSleep Teem started life in a cold war, his tribe driven far beneath the earth. When his tribe was gifted a reincarnation of Tiamat - Dogmak, the languid - they lashed out with religious vigor to protect her. Near the surface again, Teem built signs no longer tricking Goblin scouts, but instead helping pilgrims traveling to Dogmaks birth-site.

item.title: Resume
item.description: Objective === Rapidly produce iterative solutions for any kind of software through meticulous research and decisive strategy. ====== Education === Colorado State University December 2014 Bachelors of Science in Computer Science, minor in Mathematics (Major: 3.0, Minor: 3.4) ====== Experience === Conscious Cleanse Jun - Nov 2018 RaddCreative, Fort Collins, Colorado Subscription-based Checkout Solution backed by a Ember-based frontend and processed though a WooCommerce server module. Site-wide Journaling Widget built with an in-house version of a theoretical Ember feature, Routable Components.
